welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. Andrews, Canada's charming seaside town known for its stunning views, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty and charm that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimli Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gimli Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winnipeg Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Winnipeg Airport serves all international flights and includes customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
